message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to save some money if possible.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $120? This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to consider $115. Can you meet me at this price?
